root.name: Real Bout Fatal Fury Special
root.description: Overview Real Bout Fatal Fury Special (known in Japan as Real Bout Garou Densetsu Special) is a fighting game developed and published by SNK for the Neo Geo. Similar to Fatal Fury Special, much of the gameplay mechanics and character roster return from Real Bout Fatal Fury. The two-plane fight system returns from Fatal Fury Special, as well as Tung Fu Rue, Cheng Sinzan, Laurence Blood, and Wolfgang Krauser (who reprises his role as the game's boss). Geese Howard, who died in the previous game, returns in a secret "nightmare match". The game was ported to the Neo Geo CD, Sega Saturn, and Game Boy. The original Neo Geo version is included in the Fatal Fury Battle Archives Volume 2 compilation for the PlayStation 2. Other than the two-plane fight system, the only change from Real Bout Fatal Fury gameplay-wise is that recovery rolls are now standard for all characters and can only be executed when the player's power gauge is at least half-filled. Real Bout Garou Densetsu Special: Dominated Mind The game was ported to the Sony PlayStation in Japan with the "Dominated Mind" subtitle. This version contains a new protagonist, Alfred Airhawk, and a new boss character, White. The story centers around White's brainwashing of Billy Kane and his attempted takeover of the late Geese Howard's grasp on the South Town underworld. The game features animated cut-scenes, super cancels (known as "final impacts"), and parries (known as "advanced guard") at the cost of plane shifting.Characters and Stages Each character has a unique background and theme. Character Stage Terry Bogard ,and Blue Mary Andy Bogard Joe Higashi Mai Shiranui Kim Kaphwan Billy Kane Duck King Ryuji Yamazaki Jin Chonrei Jin Chonshu Sokaku Mochizuki Bob Wilson Hon-Fu Franco Bash Tung-Fue-Ru Cheng Sinzan Laurence Blood Wolfgang Krauser
